org.elasticsearch.index

Interface CloseableIndexComponent

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IndexGateway, IndexShardGateway, IndexStore, MergePolicyProvider<T>, Translog
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractIndexStore, AbstractMergePolicyProvider, DefaultFsIndexStore, FsIndexStore, FsTranslog, IndexShardGatewayService, LocalIndexGateway, LocalIndexShardGateway, LogByteSizeMergePolicyProvider, LogDocMergePolicyProvider, MmapFsIndexStore, NioFsIndexStore, NoneIndexGateway, NoneIndexShardGateway, RamIndexStore, SimpleFsIndexStore, Store, TieredMergePolicyProvider

    public interface CloseableIndexComponent

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the index component.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        void close()
           throws ElasticsearchException
        Closes the index component. A boolean indicating if its part of an actual index deletion or not is passed.
        Throws:
        ElasticsearchException
